news.body: Great job on our first in-guild Vindi kill, well done!(Lord Bob was just a warmup) Congrats to Einnyen on his wizard epic! (and thanks to GM Hwuong for being a bastard about it ^_^)
GA currently has openings for 1 monk,2 enchanters,2 clerics, 2 rogues, and 2 rangers. If interested apply at the link.
Congrats to Nilie on 61 and Makrus on 59!
/hotkey Grats Viscepra on yet another AA!
